description: bust-length portrait of a thin-lipped man with an angular face, spiky hair, and large expressive eyes wearing a suit jacket, vest, collared shirt, and tie
inscription: LLC in plate: Nov. 1919 | LL margin of sheet, in pencil: Probedruck 1. Japan. Privatexemplar | LRC of sheet, in pencil: I. | LLC of sheet in pencil, on verso: L-16 / E.138 | LRC of sheet in pencil, on verso: 2311

title: November Portrait (Self-Portrait)
